Content.Title: Summary
Text: Use the new items added by this mod to enhance your items in the game. Anywhere from simply increasing your health while wearing the modified armor, to poisoning enemies with a modified sword, to even trapping you enemies in ice with a modified bow.

Content.Title: Identification Scroll

Images.Alt: Image of crafting an identification scroll

Text: The above is a shapeless recipe. The identification scroll Used to identify items and make the able to modified by this mod. Identified an item using the scroll allows it to be modified but a modified/identified item can still be used in any way a non-modified/non-identified item can. It will tell you how many slots an item has (For what goes in slots see gems). There is a %10 chance that when identifying an item it will get an Affinity.

Content.Title: Modifying an Item

Images.Alt: Image of crafting a sword with a gem in its slot.

Text: To modify an item just put the identified item and the item to mod it with (also identified) in a shapeless recipe.

Note: This mod should work with items not only from vanilla minecraft but also items from other mods! For example: You can slot swords, bows, armor, or tools added by other mods with the gems from this mod.
